scripts._comment:build: # Building - build all or specific apps/packages
scripts._comment:dev: # Development - run dev servers for specific apps
scripts._comment:deploy: # Deployment - build and deploy specific apps
scripts.deploy: pnpm deploy:web && pnpm deploy:api && pnpm deploy:cms
scripts.deploy:api: pnpm build:api && pnpm --filter api run deploy
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm build:web && pnpm --filter web run deploy
scripts.deploy:cms: pnpm build:cms && pnpm --filter cms run deploy
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-stg --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-stg --remote
scripts.db:setup: pnpm db:auth:generate && pnpm db:generate && pnpm db:migrate:local
